title: What the H*ll Is a 'Family-Friendly' Drag Show?
description:
Drag queens messed with Texas and had a "family-friendly" drag show for little kids over the weekend. Yes, it was gross and was absolute degeneracy. Elsewhere in Texas, we find out a good guy with a gun was STOPPED by police from taking out the Uvalde shooter. And AOC says she's an Indian now. #Uvalde #LGBTQ #PrideMonth
